articles.author: Matt Beer
articles.title: Winners and losers from F1's 2024 Australian Grand Prix - The Race
articles.description: An unlikely biggest winner and an even more unlikely loser after Formula 1's action-packed 2024 Australian Grand Prix
articles.content:
The 2024 Formula 1 season received an arguably much-needed on-track shape up as Max Verstappen's misfortune proved to be Ferrari's golden opportunity.
But among the rejumbled order - and following a… [+9005 chars]
